scripts.build: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && vue-cli-service build && cd cordova_app && cordova build
scripts.ios: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && vue-cli-service build && cd cordova_app && cordova run ios --device
scripts.ios-debug: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && vue-cli-service build && cd cordova_app && cordova run ios --device --debug
scripts.browser: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && vue-cli-service build && cd cordova_app && cordova run browser --port=8200
scripts.android-build: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && vue-cli-service build && cd cordova_app && cordova build android --release
scripts.android-device: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && vue-cli-service build && cd cordova_app && cordova run android --device
scripts.android: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && vue-cli-service build && cd cordova_app && cordova run android
